full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA MDOR BSDUS PA BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B ZHES YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA MDOR BSDUS PA BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG LDAN PA @009A *, ,RANG GI CHOS SPUN RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN DANG, STOBS 'BYOR PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN SOGS KYIS, 'DI LTA BU BSDUS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LHA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRADZNYAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GUSHR'I BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, MAR GYUR SEMS CAN THAMS CAD RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU 'THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, ,,
author_simple: SU MA TI MA nI PRADZNYA,
